div.p:
Mevenide provides simple wizard (Screenshot 1) based on java project wizards for creating maven-based projects. Convenient source and output folders are already filled in, and upon commit, a POM skeleton will be created. in the future the wizard will be more flexible allowing to specify the POM more precisely.
Screenshot 1 Maven project wizard
Also in the future a POM wizard will replace the 'Create POM' contextual action.
